amendment.description: Amendment requires regional fishery management councils, in developing fishery management plans, to take into account the historic participation of local community-based fishing fleets in the fishery.
amendment.purpose: An amendment not preprinted in the Congressional Record, to require regional fishery management councils, in developing fishery management plans, to take into account the historic participation of local community-based fishing fleets in the fishery.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Miller (CA) amendment (A012) Agreed to by voice vote.
